item.title: Vim digraphs
item.description: Ever wanted to write fancy symbols in your code or your documentation, like the copyright symbol for example (©). Do you know how much time it took me to insert this symbol? Less than a second… Do you know how much time it would have took you? Well, depending on your internet connection, it might be about 10 seconds.
